questions.question: What does a red traffic light signal mean?
options: The signal is out of order
questions.explanation: A red light means that you must come to a complete stop.

questions.question: What does a yellow diamond-shaped sign indicate?
questions.explanation: Yellow diamond signs are used to warn of potential hazards on or near the road.

questions.question: What does a flashing yellow light signal mean?
options: The signal is out of order
questions.explanation: A flashing yellow light means slow down and proceed with caution.

questions.question: At an intersection, who has the right-of-way when both vehicles arrive at the same time?
options: The vehicle that is moving faster
questions.explanation: At an intersection, the vehicle on the right has the right-of-way if both vehicles arrive at the same time.

questions.question: When should you yield the right-of-way at an intersection?
options: When you have a green light
questions.explanation: You should always yield the right-of-way to oncoming traffic when you are turning left.

questions.question: What is the speed limit in a residential area unless otherwise posted in Utah?
questions.explanation: The speed limit in a residential area in Utah is 25 mph unless otherwise posted.

questions.question: When are you allowed to exceed the posted speed limit?
options: When there is no other traffic
questions.explanation: You should never exceed the posted speed limit. Speeding is illegal and dangerous.

questions.question: Where is it illegal to park your vehicle?
questions.explanation: It is illegal to park your vehicle on the sidewalk.

questions.question: When parking uphill with a curb, which way should your wheels be turned?
questions.explanation: When parking uphill with a curb, your wheels should be turned away from the curb.

questions.question: What should you do if your vehicle starts to skid on a wet road?
options: Steer in the direction of the skid
Steer in the opposite direction of the skid
questions.correctAnswer: Steer in the direction of the skid
questions.explanation: If your vehicle starts to skid, you should steer in the direction of the skid to regain control.
